mapper.select: SELECT ps.id AS postSectionId, ps.post_id AS postId, vf.file_id AS fileId, vf.file_origin_name AS fileOriginName, vf.file_path AS filePath, vf.file_name AS fileName, vf.image_type AS imageType FROM tbl_post_section ps LEFT JOIN view_file_post_section_file vf ON ps.id = vf.post_section_id WHERE ps.post_id = #{postId} AND vf.image_type = 'main'
